title: Camping with the Billionaire
description: He was her college crush—and then her stepsister’s boyfriend.Now that they’re both older and wiser, will the stars align to give their budding feelings a chance?Amid the backdrop of the Ozark Mountains, Maya and Parker come together for a common purpose—giving kids a memorable summer camp. The surprise event on the camp Love.But grumpy neighbors want to shut down the camp and the past doesn’t stay buried. Will Maya and Parker give their love a chance, or will it go up in smoke?A sweet, clean and wholesome billionaire romance novel that you won't want to put down.You can read as a standalone, but don't miss out on these other stories set in Billionaire Bachelor Cove!Family Dinners with the BillionaireMoonlight Serenade with the BillionaireTen Dates with the Billionaire
author: Amberlee Day
